definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Western business logic does not apply.
sentences.chinese: 西方生意经在中国不灵。

sentences.english: It was indecent of them to talk business at the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 他们在葬礼上谈生意经，真不象话。

sentences.english: This is the best business idea ever. Its called supply and demand.
sentences.chinese: 这是史上最高超的生意经，称为供求关系。

sentences.english: It is a moneymaking proposition he wants to see you about.
sentences.chinese: 他想见你是要谈生意经。

sentences.english: Here's the deal with a publishing company.
sentences.chinese: 这里是出版公司的一些生意经。

definition: to lay down a family fortune/to get rich/to become prosperous
the first pot of gold/the initial profits from an economic endeavour
to buy and sell/to do business/to trade/to deal
small capital, huge profit (idiom); to put in a little and get a lot out
to trade/to carry out commercial activities/in business
to talk shop all the time (idiom)
pinyin: san1 ju4 hua4 bu4 li2 ben3 hang2
